# oci_tags (Resource)

Tag many digests with many tags.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `tags` (Map of String) Map of tag -> digest to apply.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The resulting fully-qualified image ref by digest (e.g. {repo}:tag@sha256:deadbeef).
